news.title: Former CEO of celeb fav gym Dogpound launches $5M fund to back wellness companies
news.summary: Jenny Liu, is a solo first time GP looking to back underrepresented wellness founders.

news.title: Struggling fusion power company General Fusion to go public via $1B reverse merger
news.summary: General Fusion's merger with an acquisition company will net the company over $300 million. Just last year, the company ran into trouble raising money from other investors.

news.title: Waymo continues robotaxi ramp up with Miami service now open to public
news.summary: Waymo is opening its driverless robotaxis to the public in Miami, starting with a 60-square-mile service area and plans to reach the airport "soon."

news.title: Ireland proposes new law allowing police to use spyware
news.summary: The Irish government announced that it wants to pass a law that would grant police more surveillance powers, such as using spyware to fight serious crime, while aiming to protect the privacy rights of its citizens.

news.title: Google’s AI Mode can now tap into your Gmail and Photos to provide tailored responses
news.summary: The company notes that AI Mode doesn’t train directly on your Gmail inbox or Google Photos library. Instead, it trains on specific prompts and the model’s responses.

news.title: Xbox Developer Direct 2026: the biggest games and announcements
news.summary: In a now-annual tradition, Microsoft is kicking off the year with a showcase of some of its biggest upcoming games. news.title: Sony announces its first turntables in years
news.summary: Sony is releasing a new turntable for the first time since 2019. Two, in fact. The entry-level PS-LX3BT ($399.99) and step-up PS-LX5BT ($499.99) are designed for easy operation with both wired and Bluetooth hi-res audio. news.summary: Personal Intelligence is optional and rolling out first to AI Pro and AI Ultra subscribers.

news.title: Finally, a new controller that solves the Switch 2's "flat Joy-Con" problem
news.summary: But Nyxi's Hyperion 3 upgrade comes with a pretty high asking price.

news.title: eBay bans illicit automated shopping amid rapid rise of AI agents
news.summary: New policy requires "buy for me" AI tools and chatbots to obtain permission before accessing the platform.

news.title: All sorts of interesting flags and artifacts will fly to the Moon on Artemis II
news.summary: More than 2,300 commemorative items fill the duffel bag-size pouch.

news.title: Meta wants to block data about social media use, mental health in child safety trial
news.summary: Company is pulling out all the stops to protect itself in advance of New Mexico trial.

news.title: ICE Agents Are ‘Doxing’ Themselves
news.summary: The alleged risks of being publicly identified have not stopped DHS  and ICE employees from creating profiles on LinkedIn, even as Kristi Noem threatens to treat revealing agents' identities as a crime.

news.title: A Wikipedia Group Made a Guide to Detect AI Writing. Now a Plug-In Uses It to ‘Humanize’ Chatbots
news.summary: The web’s best resource for spotting AI writing has ironically become a manual for AI models to hide it.
